snippet: KRONING--Gregory. October 29, 1962, died April 5, 2016. He was a beloved father, brother, friend, and son. Services April 8, 7-9pm, Lloyd Maxcy Funeral Home. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KRONING--Gregory. October 29, 1962, died April 5, 2016. He was a beloved father, brother, friend, and son. Services April 8, 7-9pm, Lloyd Maxcy Funeral Home. 1/3
